Posts.Content: Feb 2, 2012 11:55AM ILwoman wrote: Does the itching seem to be deep in the tissue? I had right mastectomy 4.5 months.  Today I had itching deep in underarm by remaining breast. I realize that itching can be a sign of breast cancer.  I don't know if I should be alarmed by this itching.  Is it normal to have it on the opposite side from surgery?
Posts.Title: Will I ever stop itching? Held Moderators
